name: Wills
description:
Wills is a short musical game about intimacy made for the Emotions & Feelings Jam of June/July 2019.

Best played with a mouse and headphones on.

I'm pretty happy with how it turned out although i was rushing towards the end and would have loved to be able to do a lot more work on it to get the point and the feeling across further, especially on the audio. Also would've loved to make the "conversation system" more fleshed out and cooperative but didn't have enough time. I hope you enjoy it and if you have any feedback whether that be bugs or whatever then I would love to hear it! 

Thanks,

James

Twitter: @JamesBriggs123
